00037 class PWIZ_API_DECL Timer
00038 {
00039     public:
00040     Timer() {time(&start_);}
00041     double elapsed() const {time_t now; time(&now); return difftime(now, start_);}
00042 
00043     private:
00044     time_t start_;
00045     time_t finish_;
00046 };
